message.content: {"roadmap":[{"sublevels":[{"tasks":["Research successful stock video and template sellers.","Identify potential platforms for selling stock content like Pond5, Shutterstock.","Sign up for seller accounts on at least two stock platforms.","Follow top creators on social media for insights."],"sublevel_name":"Market Research and Setup","sublevel_duration":"1 week"},{"tasks":["Assess the equipment you have for video and template creation.","Create a list of essential footage and template ideas.","Set up a simple studio space at home with existing resources.","Schedule daily content creation slots in your calendar."],"sublevel_name":"Resource Assessment and Initial Content Creation","sublevel_duration":"1 week"},{"tasks":["Shoot and edit 3-5 video clips for stock libraries.","Design 2-3 simple templates (e.g., After Effects, Final Cut Pro).","Upload content with optimized titles, tags, and descriptions.","Use social media to share your upload journey behind the scenes."],"sublevel_name":"Content Creation and Initial Uploads","sublevel_duration":"1 week"},{"tasks":["Check analytics on stocks to understand early performance.","Gather feedback on templates via social media channels.","Adjust titles and tags based on early feedback and analytics.","Create a content improvement plan based on feedback."],"sublevel_name":"Feedback and Iteration","sublevel_duration":"1 week"}],"level_name":"Foundation Building","level_duration":"1 month","tangible_result":"Established presence on stock platforms with initial content uploaded and early analytics feedback."},{"sublevels":[{"tasks":["Develop a weekly schedule dedicated to both video and template creation.","Allocate specific hours for research on trending topics.","Start a content journal for video ideas and stock request notes.","Set realistic content volume goals for the week."],"sublevel_name":"Content Strategy Development","sublevel_duration":"1 week"},{"tasks":["Shoot and edit new video clips, focusing on quality and variety.","Create 4-5 templates that cater to different industries or uses.","Experiment with different shooting angles and lighting for stock videos.","Initiate interactions with potential buyers through social media comments."],"sublevel_name":"Enhanced Content Production","sublevel_duration":"1 week"},{"tasks":["Utilize free promotional tools on social media to boost visibility.","Study successful stock content profiles to improve your listings.","Optimize existing content based on best practices.","Create blog or video content sharing tips on using your stock video/templates."],"sublevel_name":"Marketing and Optimization","sublevel_duration":"1 week"},{"tasks":["Review monthly earnings and calculate ROI on each platform.","Identify which types of content perform best for further production.","Plan a social media campaign for your best-performing content.","Join online forums/groups specific to stock video creators for networking."],"sublevel_name":"Performance Review and Adjustment","sublevel_duration":"1 week"}],"level_name":"Scaling and Optimization","level_duration":"1 month","tangible_result":"Increased content library with optimized listings and growing awareness within target markets."},{"sublevels":[{"tasks":["Develop a content calendar for the next 3 months.","Research annual trends and plan themed content uploads.","Set quarterly sales targets based on past performance.","Create bundles or thematic collections for special promotions."],"sublevel_name":"Strategic Planning","sublevel_duration":"1 week"},{"tasks":["Produce content aligning with seasonal trends or upcoming events.","Test new styles or concepts that havenâ€™t been explored yet.","Create behind-the-scenes content to post on social media.","Develop a repeat customer outreach strategy (e.g., newsletter)."],"sublevel_name":"Innovative Content Development","sublevel_duration":"1 week"},{"tasks":["Experiment with different marketing techniques like contests or challenges.","Engage more with your audience by hosting Q&A sessions or live edit sessions.","Explore collaborations with other content creators online.","Begin building an email list from social media followers."],"sublevel_name":"Advanced Marketing Techniques","sublevel_duration":"1 week"},{"tasks":["Evaluate your work-life balance with your side hustle schedule.","Review which ongoing workflows need improvement or change.","Identify and test potential automation tools for repetitive tasks.","Plan steps for transitioning into full-time work."],"sublevel_name":"Work-Life Evaluation and Transition Planning","sublevel_duration":"1 week"}],"level_name":"Long-term Growth Planning","level_duration":"1 month","tangible_result":"Established long-term strategic plan with diversified content and marketing strategies aimed at turning side hustle into full-time business."}]}
